caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. LONNIE JAY BRUMMIT,

opinion.opinion_text: On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal from the May 6, 1997 decision of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant has failed to meet the burden of establishing entitlement to relief under MCR 6.508(D).
